description: My place is close to Manhattan . You’ll love my place because of Great location close to the heart of manhattan. . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Astoria Diamond
review: Najmah place was cozy and comfortable! I loved the view of the bridge and of the city from across the water. Najmah is a great host, easy to contact and made sure everything was okay with our stay. Stores and restaurants were all within walking distance, few blocks away. I would recommend her place.
